      • sortTime

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> sortTime(java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> directory)
        Sorts the files in the array of files by time with a bubble sort.
        Parameters:
        directory - The initial array of all files in the directory
        Returns:
        A sorted array of files. Sorted from youngest to oldest.
